items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and Comfortable
items.body: I recently bought this dress for a cruise, and I am absolutely in love with it! The material is high-quality and feels so comfortable against my skin. The dress has a luxurious feel and drapes beautifully. I'm 5'9", and finding a dress that is the perfect length can be challenging, but this one is just right! It hits at the perfect spot, giving it a very elegant look without being too short or too long. The only minor issue I encountered was with the zipper. It can be a little tricky to zip up because the waist material is thicker, but with a bit of patience, it’s manageable. Once zipped, the dress fits perfectly and accentuates my waist nicely. Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase. The dress is comfortable, stylish, and perfect for any formal occasion. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a beautiful and well-made dress! Read more
items.author: Jill

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Black Dress
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! I bought the Dokotoo Women's 2025 Formal Dress for a wedding I was attending as a guest, and it was everything I hoped for and more. The dress is beautifully designed with a wrap V-neck that adds a touch of sophistication and sexiness without being too revealing. The ruched detailing on the side is so flattering, giving the dress a lovely, figure-hugging fit while still being comfortable to wear. The fabric feels luxurious and not too thin, which makes it perfect for both daytime and evening events. The length is just right – not too long or short – and the overall silhouette gives an elegant, timeless look. I received so many compliments throughout the day! Additionally, the color options are stunning. I chose the classic black, which is versatile and perfect for any formal event. The dress can easily be dressed up with accessories and heels or dressed down with a cardigan for a more casual vibe. If you're looking for a dress that’s elegant, flattering, and comfortable, I highly recommend this one! It was an absolute hit at the wedding and made me feel confident and stylish all day long. Read more
items.author: Luisa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but see through
items.body: Very pretty, color (pink) was what I had expected from the photos. True to size, I'm 5'7 145lbs, normally a medium and it fit well. Only downside is that there is so liner, so the bottom is pretty see through. Unfortunately finding a slip will be more work than I'm willing to put in, since there is a slit in the skirt. I will probably be returning it, but the dress is very nice for the price. Read more
items.author: Tara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfortable, and Flattering!! A Great Semi-Formal Option!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE this dress! The material is soft and breathable, making it super comfortable to wear for extended periods. It has a nice flow to it, which gives it an elegant, effortless look. It's perfect for weddings, cocktail parties, or any occasion where you want to feel a little more dressed up without going full formal. As someone who is fuller-chested, I was a bit nervous about the fit on top, but it actually works really well. It is a bit more low-cut on me, but nothing too revealing. I was able to adjust the top slightly to get the coverage I needed. If you're bustier like me, you might consider wearing a bralette or fashion tape depending on the event. The slit on the side is a just right the amount not too high, but adds a subtle touch of sophistication. I feel confident and comfortable wearing this, which is a big win! I ordered my usual size and found it to be true to size. I’d definitely recommend this dress to anyone looking for a flattering, flowy, semi-formal option that feels as good as it looks. Read more
items.author: Kelly Root

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars the straps n zipper
items.body: The dress fits well the straps are very loose. The zipper is a rain days you have to fight to get the zipper up. I figured out how to work because I don't feel like replacing it because it is a very pretty dress. It's very lightweight very beautiful the straps are just very very loose. He does have some stretch if you have like a lace bra, your hand, potentially where the fall underneath it, because his stripes have too much give, but I would probably maybe getting like garment tape to tape the dress in the appropriate place because like I Stryper very loose and if you have a very large chest, it's gonna weigh it Down. The zipper is a totally different issue where it goes from just straight material to the roofing of the bodice. It does not zipped up correctly and me and my husband and teenager. Try to get it zipped up past that on my body it did not work. I did have to completely take it off zip it past the washing just pass it semi back into it and then have my son zip it up so that's another issue within itself. It's a beautiful dress very oretty but the zipper is just not great Read more
items.author: Ashleyhunt89

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: Great style and color. The fit was perfect! Read more
items.author: Spiers

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Came in with stains but is a pretty dress
items.body: The dress is very pretty and fits quite well considering I have quite a large bust. It has a soft material and a good amount of stretch. Unfortunately the dress came in and had multiple stains and a fabric snag as if it had already been worn. I would lean on the side of caution with ordering. Read more
items.author: Ronnie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Wine, Gray, Sky Blue 2, Blue, Apricot, Rose, Black, Green New, Red, Purple 2, Pink, Green 2, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
